OCD.name: Burst Detection
OCD.description: Perform Burst Detection on time-series textual data.

AD.name: Gamma
AD.description: State transition costs are logarithmically proportional to this value. The higher the value, the less likely a burst will reach the next level.

AD.name: Density Scaling
AD.description: This parameter controls the propability of a burst occurring. The probability increases exponentially as the scaling value increases.

AD.name: Bursting States
AD.description: The maximum number of bursting states.

AD.name: Date Format
AD.description: The format of the date column, conforming to the description at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html .

AD.name: Burst Length Unit
AD.description: How to divide the date range into burstable units.

AD.name: Burst Length
AD.description: Number of burstable units per burstable period. For example, 10 years generates bursts by decade.

AD.name: Text Separator
AD.description: The separator between strings in the text column.

AD.name: Ignore Input With Empty Text
AD.description: Ignore rows with empty text in the model.
